sentences.en: But only usageDBS prepare the PES powers to change particle's the shape andparticle reunite.
sentences.cn: 仅用DBS制备的聚醚砜微粉是无规则的形状,说明喷雾干燥破坏了DBS在 聚醚砜表面的吸附,使聚醚砜粒子在喷雾过程中发生团聚,成为分散性差的微粉.

sentences.en: Common sorrow could do something to reunite those who were engaged in this struggle.
sentences.cn: 共同的悲痛会帮助参与这场争斗的人们走到一起.

sentences.en: Internal feuds have hampered Afar attempts to reunite under one flag.
sentences.cn: 内部纷争破坏了阿法斯的团结.

sentences.en: More than 230,000 people joined Facebook group Haystack to try and reunite camera and owner.
sentences.cn: 超过23万人加入Facebook上名为[大海捞针]的团体,试图让相机回到物主手上.

sentences.en: Nanometer crystal film on the surface of the organic montmorillonite distribute as reunite state.
sentences.cn: 有机蒙脱石表面纳米TiO_ 2晶体颗粒则以团聚状分布.

sentences.en: Reports emanating from Italy claim Juve are lining up a deal to reunite Pires with Vieira.
sentences.cn: 意大利的报道透露,尤文正在准备再次让皮雷斯和韦拉联手.

sentences.en: Reunite with her after 12 years of separation but already have afiance.
sentences.cn: 分别12年后又重逢,而这时我已经有了未婚妻.

sentences.en: She spent the post-war years of her marriage trying to reunite father and son.
sentences.cn: 在战后几年的婚姻生活中，她千方百计想让父子团聚。

sentences.en: So he sent for Xu Deyan and allowed the husband and wife to reunite.
sentences.cn: 于是,他派人找来了徐德言,让他们夫妻团圆了.

sentences.en: The band will reunite for a US tour.
sentences.cn: 乐队将重聚作美国巡演。

sentences.en: The band will reunite for this show only.
sentences.cn: 乐队的重聚仅仅是为了这场演出。

sentences.en: The class have been able to reunite 10 years after graduation.
sentences.cn: 同学们毕业十年了,今天才得以相聚.

sentences.en: The end of cold war gave EU a very rare historic opportunity to reunite Europe.
sentences.cn: 冷战的终结使欧盟获得了再次统一欧洲的千载难逢的历史性机遇.

sentences.en: The two halves are starting to reunite.
sentences.cn: 两半边的头脑开始重聚.

sentences.en: This grand angel will not come from above to reunite with you.
sentences.cn: 这个崇高的天使不会从天上下来与你结合.

sentences.en: Traditionally, Chinese New Year is a time for families to reunite.
sentences.cn: 传统上, 中国新年是家人围聚的时光.

trans.tran_en: to come together again or to bring people, parts of an organization, political party, or country together again

trans.tran_cn: 使再次联合，使重聚，使再结合
